name: Bubble Story for MiniJam 84: Bubbles
description:
Bubble story. Nobody knows what happening, but only you can solve this problem. Try yourself in various test chambers, fight with enemies and if you were attentive enough, you will get what you deserve!

Requires Java JRE on your pc.

(Due to the current situation, the project positions itself as a libGDX game-demo, with bad rendering ability)
